definition: Guangxi province in south China/since 1959, Guangxi Zhuang autonomous region 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区[Guang3 xi1 Zhuang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1], location of the Zhuang ethnic group, abbr. 桂[Gui4], capital Nanning 南寧|南宁[Nan2 ning2]
surname Guang
wide/numerous/to spread
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
west
to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)
to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department

sentences.english: The Hepu Tombs, from the Han Dynasty, are in Guangxi province.
sentences.chinese: 漢代的合浦陵園在廣西省境內。

sentences.english: The third case is an 18-year-old male from Beiliu City, Guangxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 第三例是一名來自廣西省北流市的18歲男子。

sentences.english: Yangshuo lies in the northeast of Guangxi Province and to the southeast of Guilin City.
sentences.chinese: 陽朔坐落於廣西省東北部，在桂林的東南面。

sentences.english: While in Yulin, Guangxi province, there is a dog meat festival that held every year.
sentences.chinese: 然而在廣西省玉林市，有個每年都舉行的狗肉節。

sentences.english: That honor belongs to this coastal city in Guangxi province.
sentences.chinese: 這份榮譽屬於廣西省的海邊城市，北海。

sentences.english: I come from BeiHai, a city of GuangXi province.
sentences.chinese: 我來自北海市的廣西省。

sentences.english: In this image, from Guangxi Province, a woman sells eggs in a narrow alleyway.
sentences.chinese: 圖中，廣西省，一位婦女在狹小的衚衕裏販賣雞蛋。

sentences.english: In mid-July, I will go on a journey in Guangxi province with my sister.
sentences.chinese: 七月中旬，我會和妹妹一起去廣西省。

sentences.english: SPARKLE Moonlight Yorkshire stems in Nanning City in Guangxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 旌宇月光約克夏梗設在廣西省南寧市。
